items.sentence: If your shirt is tucked into your jeans, you should wear a belt.
Would you be surprised if I told you my name isn't actually Tom?
There isn't anything that anyone can do to avoid the inevitable.
It doesn't matter where you go in Holland, you'll see windmills.
Tom didn't marry the woman we all thought he was going to marry.
If you had one word to describe Tom, how would you describe him?
Tom agreed to the end user license agreement without reading it.
Did you know that Tom and Mary used to be married to each other?
Do you think that you could translate this document into French?
Tom lived a couple of blocks away from me when we were children.
The police asked Tom to tell them what the intruder was wearing.
You aren't really going to get rid of your classic car, are you?
It doesn't seem strange, but for some reason it feels strange...
Tom climbed the ladder slowly and hesitantly, afraid of falling.
Tom is probably not going to ask Mary for permission to do that.
Were you able to visit all the museums that you wanted to visit?
Don't let Tom eat dessert until he eats everything on his plate.
If you keep doing things like that, you'll be hated by everyone.
I can't remember the name of the girl I met last week in Boston.
You're going to electrocute yourself if you aren't more careful.
